Title: Bonnie & Neddy
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Tom Herpich, Steve Wolfhard, Kent Osborne (story), Adam Muto (story), Jack Pendarvis (story)
Actors: Andrew Daly, John DiMaggio, Andres Salaff, Paul Scheer
Plot: The greed of the King of Ooo leads to a crisis in the Candy Kingdom, and (ex-) Princess Bubblegum has to return briefly from exile to deal with it.
